sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row>
    <v-col
      cols="12"
      sm="6"
      md="4"
    >
    <v-menu offset-y>
      <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
        <v-text-field
          v-model="date"
          label="Picker in menu"
          readonly
          v-bind="attrs"
          v-on="on"
        ></v-text-field>
      </template>
  
      <v-date-picker
        @input="$emit('input', $event.replace(/-/g, '/'))"
        no-title
        locale="ja-ja"
        :day-format="value => new Date(value).getDate()"
      ></v-date-picker>
    </v-menu>
   </v-col>
    <v-spacer></v-spacer>
  </v-row>

</template>


<script>
import { formatDateToJa } from '../../functions/datetime';

export default {
  name: 'DateForm',
  props: ['value', 'isError'],
  methods: {
    formatDateToJa,
  },

  data: () => ({
    date: (new Date(Date.now() - (new Date()).getTimezoneOffset() * 60000)).toISOString().substr(0, 10),
  }),
};
</script>
